description: List background jobs with optional filters. Accepts optional JobFilterInput with jobType (String, e.g., 'insert_csv_file', 'export_csv'), status (array of String: 'pending', 'processing', 'completed', 'failed'), limit (Int, default 100). Returns JobConnection with items (array of Job with uuid, jobType, status, data, jobResponse, retryCount, retryInterval, createdAt, updatedAt) and total count. Uses ConnectraClient.list_jobs to retrieve jobs from Connectra service. User isolation enforced via user_uuid filter.
graphql_operation: query ListJobs($input: JobFilterInput) { jobs { jobs(input: $input) { items { uuid jobType status data createdAt } total } } }
